channel.title: Connecting to server over ssh using whonix. It is really that safe?
channel.description: I have been connecting to my virtual private server with whonix. But i think it is really that safe ? It is somehow possible to de-anonymise me when i'm connecting to server over SSH ? Or using SCP?

item.title: Connecting to server over ssh using whonix. It is really that safe?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
There is nothing super specific about these applications. However, making broad claims such as “really safe”, which would equal proving a negative, which is impossible to do seriously.

The easiest way to mess up is the payment trail. See also:

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Money

Or data you used during sign up. See also:

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/DoNot#Login_into_your_real_life_Facebook_account_and_think_you_are_anonymous. applies

See also:

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Warning
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/DoNot
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Documentation

Read full topic
item.source: Connecting to server over ssh using whonix. It is really that safe?

item.title: Connecting to server over ssh using whonix. It is really that safe?
item.dc:creator: PeterK
item.description:
I have been connecting to my virtual private server with whonix. But i think it is really that safe ?
It is somehow possible to de-anonymise me when i’m connecting to server over SSH ? Or using SCP?
